item.description:
This film was originally scheduled for February 8 & has now been rescheduled for March 16.

The Vow (book by Kim & Krickitt Carpenter). Inspired by a true-story, The Vow is a tale of a love that refuses to be forgotten. Leo is devastated when a car accident plunges his wife Paige into a deep coma. She miraculously recovers but the last five years of her memories have vanished. Suddenly, Leo finds himself married to a stranger who canâ€™t remember anything about him. Desperately, Leo tries to recreate the moments that shaped their romance. Can he rekindle the passion before he loses Paige forever? Channing Tatum and Rachel Adams star. 104 mins. Drama/Romance. Rated PG-13.

20 free copies of the book from which the film has been adapted will be given out. Limited seating. Please contact Evelyn Angry-Smith to reserve your seat. 860.512.2874/ eangry-smith@mcc.commnet.edu
item.name: MCC Book to Film Series - The Vow Rescheduled!
